Michael learns about River's past relationship with Eden's mother and the circumstances surrounding their life on the run. As River faces serious charges, a flamboyant lawyer named Dick Dentner steps in to represent him, much to Michael's dismay.

* Billy, eager to learn more about his brother Cane, probes Amber about their past relationship. Amber speaks highly of Cane's character, attributing their breakup to mistakes. Meanwhile, Colleen, following through on her plan to secure Daniel for herself, encourages Billy's pursuit of Amber, creating a tangled web of romantic tension.

* Lily and Daniel share a heartfelt conversation about love and relationships, with Lily emphasizing the importance of being with the right person. As the night progresses, Colleen seizes an opportunity to seduce Daniel, while Amber and Billy retreat to his hotel room, setting the stage for potential complications and emotional turmoil.
</summary>

<summary>
* Jack resigns from the Abbott-Winters foundation, wanting to distance himself from Billy and what he represents. He feels betrayed by both Billy and Phyllis and no longer believes in the mission of the foundation. Jack's anger and hurt are palpable, leading to a heated confrontation with Billy.

* Billy, feeling no remorse, argues that Jack pushed Phyllis away, leading her to seek solace in his arms. He points out Jack's hypocrisy, highlighting a past transgression where Jack slept with their father's wife. Ashley tries to mediate between her brothers, but her efforts prove futile.

* Phyllis, devastated by the situation, confides in Nikki about Jack's decision to divorce her. Nikki encourages Phyllis to fight for their love, drawing parallels to her own tumultuous relationship with Victor. She advises Phyllis to remind Jack of their happy memories and not give up hope.

* Victoria grapples with her own complicated feelings as Travis suggests they take a step back in their relationship. She realizes that she has been holding back due to her lingering feelings for Billy. Travis's understanding and patience prompt Victoria to confront her emotions and choose a future with him.

* Lily expresses her distrust of Hilary, convinced that she will make a move on Jack now that he is vulnerable. Devon defends his wife, believing that she has changed and is committed to their marriage. Lily remains skeptical, unconvinced that Hilary's past actions can be so easily dismissed.

* Hilary, attempting to be a friend to Jack, offers support and advice based on her own experiences with Neil. She highlights Phyllis's remorse and love for Jack, urging him to consider his next move carefully. However, Jack remains furious and unforgiving, consumed by images of Phyllis's betrayal.

* Neil, deeply concerned about both Jack and Billy, tries to guide them towards healing. He encourages Billy to return to the 12 steps and make amends for his actions. Neil emphasizes the importance of breaking destructive patterns for the sake of Billy's children and his own well-being.

* Ashley, caught in the crossfire, expresses her frustration and pain to Nikki. She feels torn between her brothers and worries about the impact of their feud on the entire family. Ashley believes that Phyllis is the root of the problem and encourages Jack to move on without her.

* The confrontation between Jack and Phyllis escalates as he throws her belongings into a suitcase, demanding that she leave the house. Phyllis pleads with him to reconsider, but Jack remains resolute in

<summary>
* At the hospital, Damon's life hangs in the balance as doctors and nurses frantically work to save him. Phyllis and Daniel anxiously wait for news, grappling with the gravity of the situation and the possibility of losing Damon. As Damon fights for his life, he is visited by the spirit of his deceased son, Elias, who offers comfort and reassurance. Elias reminds Damon of his love for him and urges him to let go of the anger and hate that have consumed him since Elias's death.

* Meanwhile, Ashley grapples with the devastating realization that her hopes for a future with Victor were nothing more than a fantasy. Brad confronts Ashley about her infatuation with Victor, blaming her for the demise of their marriage and the pain it has caused their family. Ashley, filled with regret, acknowledges her mistakes and the sacrifices she made for a love that was never truly hers.

* Victor, though aware of Ashley's feelings for him, reiterates his unwavering love for Nikki, assuring her that she is the only woman for him. Nikki, hurt and angered by Ashley's betrayal, struggles to come to terms with the situation and grapples with the desire to confront Ashley about her actions. Victor urges Nikki to be the bigger person and show Ashley compassion, recognizing that she is already hurting.

* Lauren is shocked to learn about Kevin's plan to engage in a physical fight with Michael over her. She questions the logic behind such an action, emphasizing that violence will not solve anything and will only exacerbate the situation. Despite Lauren's pleas, Michael, understanding Kevin's need to express his anger, reluctantly agrees to the confrontation, hoping to reason with Kevin and prevent any serious harm.

* Lily, still reeling from her traumatic encounter with Alex, confides in Kevin about her lingering fear and the recurring nightmares that haunt her. Kevin, feeling a sense of responsibility for Lily's trauma, vows to protect her and assures her that Alex will never hurt her again. Lily, initially angry at Kevin for his past actions, acknowledges that his presence in her life ultimately led to her rescue from Alex.

* Nick, determined to help Sharon find employment and boost her self-esteem, proposes a plan to Jack: Jabot could hire Sharon, but Nick would secretly cover her salary. Jack expresses concerns about the potential repercussions if Sharon were to discover the truth, but ultimately agrees to explore the possibility. Nick, grateful for Jack's willingness to help, promises to return the favor in the future.

* As

<summary>
* Chance is honored for his bravery with a commendation ceremony attended by his family and girlfriend, Chloe. During the ceremony, Chance insists on Chloe being in the photo with him, much to the displeasure of Jill, who sees Chloe as opportunistic. Later, Jill voices her concerns to Kay and Nina, believing Chloe will try to reunite with Billy now that he and Mac have broken up.

* Mac breaks up with Billy after finding out he slept with Kelly.  Billy tries to downplay the situation, claiming it didn't mean anything and that he was depressed about their potential separation. However, Mac sees it as a pattern of behavior for Billy and decides she can't be with him anymore.

* Daniel, facing a possible indictment, panics about the possibility of returning to jail. Amber suggests they flee the country, but both Phyllis and Michael advise against it, knowing it will only hurt his case. Phyllis, desperate to help her son, pleads with Michael to do whatever it takes to keep Daniel out of jail.

* The grand jury hearing for Daniel's case approaches, with both Deacon and Ryder set to testify. Daniel, Kevin, and Jana try to get information from Ryder, who remains tight-lipped.  Michael attempts to gain leverage over Heather by threatening to expose her underhanded tactics to the media and Owen.
</summary>

• Kevin offers to raise Daisy's baby, causing conflict with Phyllis.

<summary>

• Gloria returns from France and decides to stay with Lauren and Michael, much to Chloe's chagrin.
• Phyllis tells Jack that she is done fighting for her job and is ready to move on.
• Billy spends Christmas Eve with Ashley and Traci, but their evening is interrupted by Jack.
• Devon announces at his Christmas Eve party that Hilary will be returning to GC Buzz as host and executive producer.

<summary>
• Faith runs away from Sharon's house because she is upset that her parents broke up.
• Dylan finds Faith at the coffeehouse and calls Sharon and Nick.
• Ashley and Stitch try to pretend that their one-night stand didn't happen.
• Victoria tells Billy that she wants to name their daughter Katherine Rose Newman.
• Billy is upset that Victoria doesn't want to give their daughter his last name.
• Jill is opposed to the warehouse-development project and vows to fight it.
• Constance tells Adam that his father committed suicide after Victor Newman took over his company.
• Adam promises Constance that he will make Victor pay for what he did to his father.
• Avery learns that her application to have the warehouse district designated as a historical landmark has been denied.
• Dylan believes that someone with a lot of power is behind the redevelopment project.

<summary>
• Jack and Jill agree to a deal where Jabot acquires Chancellor, but the deal is contingent on Cane staying on.
• Ashley is unhappy about the deal and tries to convince Jill to back out.
• Meanwhile, the Jabot board votes to require the CEO to work from the office, forcing Jack to choose between caring for Dina and his role at Jabot.
• Lily struggles with Cane's new family situation and Hilary's involvement.
• Devon is supportive of Lily but doesn't believe Hilary has ulterior motives.
• Nick proposes building a new dream home for him and Chelsea, but she ultimately decides she prefers their current home.
• Mattie and Charlie attend a party where Reed drinks alcohol and then tries to drive, leading Mattie to call the police.
• Lily supports Mattie's decision but Mattie worries about the impact on her relationship with Reed.
• The episode ends with Victoria receiving a call from the police informing her that Reed has been arrested.
